name: Hackathon
description: A week of applying lessons to a real project for a real client.
opinions: Although this was a very short week for me, I very much enjoyed the assignment and the freedom we were given during it. I learned a lot more than I thought I could in such a short period of time!
integration: Due to the specifity of this project and our choices, I haven't integrated any of the hackathon's methods anywhere else yet. However, I will take what I learned about collaboration and efficiency with me in the future.
